name: Revolver (itch) (Dead Unicorn)
description:
Revolver was made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

All art, music and code assets were made during the jam period. Excluding a few helper scripts and GMS2 libraries.

Some audio sounds came from Zapsplat.com and the rest were made during the jam.

All music was made by the talented @Jabbu.

Prologue

The world is separated into two plains of existence, light and dark. You walk the line between both, ridding the lands of exiled creatures. Your body is made of immortal dark matter, you are born again.

You find an unstable, cursed revolver. Exterminate all exiled beasts and cleanse the realms.

Controls
  • Move  A & D
  • Jump Space
  • Shoot  Left MB
  • Reload R
  • Reborn Space
  • Toggle GUI F9
  • Toggle Fullscreen F
